name: Medusa_tool-color
description: This NFT is not an artwork on its own but rather a tool for artists to create customised Medusa patterns. You can change the properties of the patterns by interacting with the toolbar on the bottom. The parameters CHAOS, CURL, and SPEED can be changed by clicking them and dragging the mouse on their left/right. Find some hints, tips, and community made drawings at https://bit.ly/33u07uQ
